channel.title: NK Suggestion Checklist
channel.description:
**Does your Neutral Killer have some way of preventing poison/bleed or able to get rid of it?**
Possessor: Possess a confirmed BD and claim poisoned. Sorcerer: Poison/bleed immune Reaper: Consume soul to stay alive
**Does your Neutral Killer have some way of preventing poison/bleed or able to get rid of it?**
Possessor: Possess a confirmed BD and claim poisoned. Sorcerer: Poison/bleed immune Reaper: Consume soul to stay alive
This allows the NK to claim healing classes without getting fouled by the Unseen.
**Does your Neutral Killer have an empowered kill**
Reaper: Bypass Healing Possessor: Anti-Princess and Observer Sorcerer: Does not attack Knights and does not attack Allies
**Does your Neutral Killer have it’s own uniqueness to it?**
Reaper: Reaper targets appear alive, souls passive Possessor: Possess able to defile yourself and Possess others Sorcerer: Inquisitor chasing after it
**Does your Neutral Killer have some form of way of surviving death?**
Possessor: Night Immune Reaper: Consume Souls Sorcerer: Night Immune
**Does your Neutral Killer have something to deceive others**
Possessor: Possess Reaper: Chill and Reaped Corpses Sorcerer: Magic Dust
If I think of any more I will edit the post and add it, suggestions are welcome
Disclaimer: This is by no means what you have to do in order to have a successful NK class suggestion. This is just some guidance for new players.

item.title: NK Suggestion Checklist
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
well I’d say many of us would say… sorcerer is currently a gimped NK class that shouldn’t be in on it’s current form. See many posts in the suggestions category on that subject. I do think it’s silly that he has the ultimate deception (IE fools the heck out of the inquisitioner), but is the least able to avoid BD.

Read full topic

item.title: NK Suggestion Checklist
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
But the Scorned Frame targets multiple classes, not only one. Although, I guess you could count it similar to Magic Dust.

Read full topic

item.title: NK Suggestion Checklist
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Its deception in the same sense the scorned frame is.

item.title: NK Suggestion Checklist

item.description:
Magic dust isn’t really that much of deception but I’ll add it

item.title: NK Suggestion Checklist
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Sorcerer - Magic dust
Reaper - Chill, Reaped corpses

It does not have to be a particular kind of deception
